name: Warriors
description:
Warriors are free to play multiplatform game with these goals:

  1. Easy to play missions with high replay value
  2. Raid boss battle for each chapter
  3. Each mission should be playable solo or with friends
  4. You can bring up to 5 friends to coop
  5. Missions should be hardest alone
  6. Players will be always able to tweek graphics settings regardles of platform
  7. There is no plan for PVP right now

PS: All these points are game goals, but not all of them are implemented right now

PPS: I will try to add support for all platforms that I can but for now only Linux, Android and Windows will be supported

NOTICE: This project is not done and under heavy development. Please keep that in mind while playing

Work progress: https://trello.com/b/cLu8MAhc/warriors
